steps.description: Create the Teacher pages directory structure. This is a new folder that will contain teacher-specific pages including GroupsList.razor.
Create the Teacher components directory structure. This is a new folder that will contain teacher-specific reusable components like GroupCard.razor.

Create GroupCard.razor component that displays group summary information. The component should:

1. Add @code block with parameters:
   - [Parameter] Group Group - the group to display
   - [Parameter] EventCallback OnClick - callback for when the card is clicked

2. Create a clickable div with class "inner-card cursor-pointer" that invokes OnClick when clicked

3. Display group name in h3 with class "text-lg font-semibold gradient-text-pink mb-2"

4. Display creation date formatted as "Created: MMM dd, yyyy" with class "text-sm opacity-75 mb-2"

5. Calculate and display active students count (students where IsCompleted == false) from Group.StudentSessions collection. Display as "Active Students: X" with class "text-sm mb-2"

6. Calculate and display overall progress as an aggregate indicator:
   - For groups with students: calculate average progress percentage across all student sessions using (CurrentProgress / TotalSteps * 100) for percentage goals or (IsCompleted ? 100 : 0) for binary goals
   - For groups without students: show 0%
   - Display a progress bar div with width based on calculated percentage using inline style
   - The progress bar container should have class "w-full h-2 rounded-full" with background rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.2)
   - The progress fill should have classes "h-full rounded-full" with gradient background from primary to secondary colors
   - Display percentage text next to progress bar

Create GroupsList.razor page for the teacher groups dashboard. The page should:

1. Add page directive: @page "/groups"
2. Add @attribute [Authorize] to require authentication (per REQ-AUTH-007)
3. Inject IGroupService as GroupService and IAuthenticationService as AuthService
4. Inject AuthenticationStateProvider for getting current user claims

5. Add @code block with:
   - private IEnumerable<Group>? groups field for storing loaded groups
   - private bool isLoading = true field for loading state
   - private string? errorMessage field for error handling

6. Override OnInitializedAsync to:
   - Get AuthenticationState from AuthenticationStateProvider
   - Call AuthService.GetCurrentUserAsync(authState.User) to get current user
   - If user is null, set errorMessage to "Unable to load user information"
   - Call GroupService.GetTeacherGroupsAsync(user.Id) to load groups
   - Set isLoading = false after loading
   - Wrap in try-catch setting errorMessage on exception

7. Add NavigateToGroup method that takes groupId int parameter and navigates to /groups/{groupId} using NavigationManager

8. Add NavigateToCreateGroup method that navigates to /groups/create

9. Create the page layout:
   - Wrap content in container div with "container mx-auto py-8 px-4"
   - Add header section with h1 "My Groups" using "text-3xl font-bold gradient-text mb-6"
   - Add "Create Group" button with class "glow-button" that calls NavigateToCreateGroup

10. Display loading state with "Loading..." text when isLoading is true

11. Display error state showing errorMessage when not null using a div with error styling

12. Handle empty state when groups?.Any() is false:
   - Display a glow-container with friendly message: "You haven't created any groups yet."
   - Include secondary text encouraging teacher to create their first group
   - Include a "Create Your First Group" glow-button linking to create page

13. Display groups in a table when groups exist:
   - Wrap table in glow-container with p-6
   - Create HTML table with class "w-full"
   - Add thead with columns: Name, Created, Active Students, Overall Progress (use opacity-75 for header text)
   - Add tbody iterating over groups collection
   - Each tr should have class "inner-card cursor-pointer hover:bg-opacity-20" and @onclick calling NavigateToGroup(group.Id)
   - Display group.Name in first td
   - Display group.CreatedAt.ToString("MMM dd, yyyy") in second td
   - Calculate active student count as group.StudentSessions.Count(s => !s.IsCompleted) for third td
   - Calculate and display overall progress percentage in fourth td with a small progress bar (similar to GroupCard)

14. Import ProgressPath.Models namespace for Group, GoalType access

considerations: The Group model already includes StudentSessions as a navigation property, and GetTeacherGroupsAsync includes .Include(g => g.StudentSessions), so progress calculation data is available
Active students are defined as those with IsCompleted == false per the StudentSession model
For overall progress calculation, handle both GoalType.Binary (0 or 100%) and GoalType.Percentage (CurrentProgress / TotalSteps * 100) cases
The page uses MainLayout which already includes ParticleBackground, so no additional particle background setup needed
Authentication is enforced via [Authorize] attribute which redirects to login per existing patterns in Home.razor
GetCurrentUserAsync requires the ClaimsPrincipal from AuthenticationState, not direct injection - must use AuthenticationStateProvider
Empty state should be visually appealing and guide the teacher to create their first group
Table rows should be clickable to navigate to group detail (route /groups/{groupId} which will be implemented in a separate assignment)
CSS classes glow-container, inner-card, glow-button, gradient-text, gradient-text-pink are already defined in app.css
NavigationManager needs to be injected for programmatic navigation to group detail and create pages
The Group model has TotalSteps property for percentage goals, and null for binary goals - handle null case appropriately
Consider showing IsConfirmed status visually - unconfirmed groups cannot be joined by students yet
